name: Dice in my Blood
description:
Explore randomly generated dungeons, using your dice to fight enemies and unlock chests (to find more dice !). You can trade dice with the merchant. If you lose all your dice, you've lost the game.

Escape - Close the game

R - Reset the game

Art freely provided by Luiz Melo : https://luizmelo.itch.io/ and Admurin https://admurin.itch.io/
